methek aa gamane di herath kadulu 48k da, malinga kadulu 230k da dawagena athi athara thirimanna lakunu 908k laba thibe.palamu tharagaya krida kala thanathille ma ada krida kirimata siduwuwahoth thawath dangapandu yawannaku yedawimata apeksha karana bawa apa kala wimasumaka di shri lanka therim kamitu sabhapathi sanath jayasuriya mahatha pawasiya. herath samaga thawath dangapandu yawannaku yoda gathahoth palamu tharagayata krida kala jehan mubarakge thana boho durata sachithra senanayakata ho ajantha mendista himiwanu atha.
